attributes.action: Offer Home Student tuition for HK BN(O) Visa holders studying UK universities
attributes.additional_details: The decision involved public funds and Government may help HK new migrants through discussion/passing the bill. Or requirements can be shorten from 5 years to 3 years as to in line with home student requirement for BC.
attributes.background:
UK Government should consider providing for Hong Kong students 
to be charged domestic fees for higher education in the UK, instead of  waiting for 5 years to get IDR to be eligible for home student requirements. This does not assist current new migrants as they are mainly young people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581679
